intro: Xerosicyos, commonly known as the desert gourd, is a flowering plant native to arid and semi-arid regions of Africa and the Middle East. It belongs to the Cucurbitaceae family, which includes cucumbers, melons, and squash. The plant is characterized by its woody, branching stems and small, pale green leaves.
